name: Endless (Bruiserjoe)
description:
You play as a flesh machine, surviving a great challenge. 

Gameplay:

     Dodge enemies and don't die

Gamemodes:

      Normal: Start with 10 health

      Hardcore: Only have 1 health

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

S - Down

Unzip the .exe, the resource, and the music folders in the same directory 

Made in OlcPixelGameEngine
